profile.ja:
1946年 富山県高岡市生
1964年 富山県立高岡高等学校卒
趣味 ドライブ旅行

主な発明品の実用化と相手企業（特許等工業所有権に関係するもの.年は実用化の年）
昭和52年 コンデンサ封止用脂環式エポキシ樹脂塗料（アサヒ化学研究所）
昭和57年 電子回路印刷配線用銅導電塗料（北陸電気工業：世界で初めて実用化）
昭和61年 セラミックス湿度センサー及び温湿度計（日本鉱業、現JX日鉱日石）
昭和62年 フレキシブル基板用エポキシ変性ポリパラバン酸樹脂（東燃化学）
昭和62年 樹脂成形磁性体ｺｱ（武内ﾌﾟﾚｽ工業：ﾗﾐﾈｰﾄﾁｭｰﾌﾞ高周波溶着用:注目発明選定）
平成 1年 電荷移動錯体型銅導電塗料（日本油脂：電子回路印刷配線用）
平成 3年 低温硬化型１液性エポキシ樹脂塗料（アサヒ化学研究所：ﾁｯﾌﾟ 部品接着用）
平成 6年 圧電性エポキシ樹脂とＰＺＴ複合シート（東洋化工：電子楽器用）
平成 7年 厚膜サーミスタ（立山科学工業：携帯電話温度補償用等）
平成12年 3.6V,20Ah ポリマーバッテリー（マクセル北陸精器、現日立マクセル）
平成13年 吸血アブ誘引・駆除装置（トミプラ）
平成15年 マイナスイオン発生素子（アイクリエイト）
平成21年 ハンダ付け用導電塗料（マクセル北陸精器→アイクリエイトが引き継ぐ）

その他
・学会論文誌、学会大会論文集、専門誌等発表論文数：259件(平成24年3月1日現在)
・特許出願件数：国内84件、国外13件(内、権利化特許：37件)(平成24年3月1日現在)
・エッセイ等：78編(一般雑誌、新聞社等からの依頼投稿、平成24年3月1日現在)

paper_title.en: Development of SnO2-based Gas Sensors for Detection of Volatile Organic Compounds

description.en: Recently, sick-house syndrome receive much public attention as a problem of indoor environment. Volatile organic compounds (VOC5) such as formaldehyde (HCHO) and xylene (C6H4(CH3)2) generated from building materials are pointed out as one of origins of sick-house syndrome. In the present work, in order to develop a semiconductor type VOC sensor, first of all, the sensitivities of several oxide semiconductor materials were studied. Among the 23 metals oxides examined, the highest sensitivity to HCHO was achieved by Sn(X Further, the sensing property of an SnO2 sensor to 100 ppm HCHO was extremely improved by addition of 3 wt% Ag at 300°C, but the sensor had a short lifetime. In order to explore another additives, VOC sensing properties of SnO2 loaded with several metal oxides were investigated. Among the elements loaded (5 wt%) with each of 14 metal oxides, the Mn203-loaded one was outstanding in sensitivity to HCHO at 200Â. However, its sensitivity of the doubly promoted sensor, Ag (1 wt%) -Mn2O3 (5 wt%) -SnO2 to HCHO was lower than that of each sensor loaded with one additive. © 2001, The Institute of Electrical Engineers of Japan. All rights reserved.

publication_name.en: IEEJ Transactions on Sensors and Micromachines

paper_title.ja: 厚膜集積化ガスセンサによる室内ＶＯＣの識別
HEAT TREATMENT EFFECT ON TRANSFORMATION PROPERTIES OF TiNi SHAPE MEMORY ALLOY FILM :
paper_title.en: Heat Treatment effect on transformation Properties of TiNi Shape Memory Alloy Film.

description.ja: The heat treatment effect on transformation properties of a NiTi Shape Memory Alloy(SMA)film is discussed. TiNi SMA films were deposited by using sputter deposition techniques, and were then solution-treated and aging-treated. The phase transformation properties were investigated by means of a differential scanning calorimeter(DSC), X-ray diffractometer and a transmission electron microscope(TEM). As sputtered film had an amorphous structure with fluctuating density of titanium atoms. The films solution-treated at 600℃ and aging-treated at 400℃ had several kinds of phases. The rhombohedral phases, austenite phases and amorphous phases could be distinguished within the same film. The film solution-treated at 800℃ and aging-treated at 400℃ showed the largest enthalpy of the transformation and had the preferable crystalline structure. The samples solutioin-treated at 1000℃, in which NiTi were resolved partially into Ti_2Ni and Ni_4Ti_3 were more brittle.
description.en: The heat treatment effect on transformation properties of a NiTi Shape Memory Alloy(SMA)film is discussed. TiNi SMA films were deposited by using sputter deposition techniques, and were then solution-treated and aging-treated. The phase transformation properties were investigated by means of a differential scanning calorimeter(DSC), X-ray diffractometer and a transmission electron microscope(TEM). As sputtered film had an amorphous structure with fluctuating density of titanium atoms. The films solution-treated at 600℃ and aging-treated at 400℃ had several kinds of phases. The rhombohedral phases, austenite phases and amorphous phases could be distinguished within the same film. The film solution-treated at 800℃ and aging-treated at 400℃ showed the largest enthalpy of the transformation and had the preferable crystalline structure. The samples solutioin-treated at 1000℃, in which NiTi were resolved partially into Ti_2Ni and Ni_4Ti_3 were more brittle.

publisher.ja: The Society of Materials Science, Japan

publication_name.en: Materials Science Research International, Vol. 3, No. 4, September 1997

paper_title.ja: Reversible Actuator of Shape-Memory Alloy Film with Inverse Force Layer
paper_title.en: REVERSIBLE ACTUATOR OF SHAPE-MEMORY ALLOY FILM WITH INBVERSE FORCE LAYER :

description.ja: The fabrication and processing of an actuator with a TiNi shape memory alloy(SMA)film are discussed and demonstrated. TiNi SMA films were deposited by using sputter deposition techniques, patterned and etched. These films were solution-treated and aging-treated, and then an inverse force layer of chromium was deposited on a SMA film. The frequency response of beam type actuator was measured by the resistance heating. The maximum amplitude was in proportion to inverse force, and was therefore controlled by chromium thickness. The maximum displacement decreased sligtly with an increase of frequency. The minimum displacement suddenly increased at more than 0.1 Hz and was constant above 1 Hz. The characteristic of the frequency response of the actuator was not decided by chromium thickness but TiNi thickness, because thickness of the latter was fifteen to forty times larger than that of the former. Because the frequency response depended on the heat radiation of an actuator, TiNi thickness was the most important factor to the actuation.
description.en: The fabrication and processing of an actuator with a TiNi shape memory alloy(SMA)film are discussed and demonstrated. TiNi SMA films were deposited by using sputter deposition techniques, patterned and etched. These films were solution-treated and aging-treated, and then an inverse force layer of chromium was deposited on a SMA film. The frequency response of beam type actuator was measured by the resistance heating. The maximum amplitude was in proportion to inverse force, and was therefore controlled by chromium thickness. The maximum displacement decreased sligtly with an increase of frequency. The minimum displacement suddenly increased at more than 0.1 Hz and was constant above 1 Hz. The characteristic of the frequency response of the actuator was not decided by chromium thickness but TiNi thickness, because thickness of the latter was fifteen to forty times larger than that of the former. Because the frequency response depended on the heat radiation of an actuator, TiNi thickness was the most important factor to the actuation.

publisher.ja: The Society of Materials Science, Japan

publication_name.ja: Materials Science Research International, Vol. 2, No. 3, September 1996

TiNi SMA films were deposited by using sputter deposition techniques, patterned and etched. These films were solution-treated and aging-treated, and then an inverse force layer of chromium was deposited on a SMA film. The frequency response of beam type actuator was measured by the resistance heating. The maximum amplitude was in proportion to inverse force, and was therefore controlled by chromium thickness. Because the frequency response depended on the heat radiation of an actuator, TiNi thickness was the most important factor to the actuation.

paper_title.en: Preparation of dielectric thin films of pb(mg1/3nb2/3)0.9ti0.1]o3 by screen printing method

description.en: Dielectric thin films of Pb[(Mg1/3Nb2/3)0.9Ti0.1]O3 were obtained by a screen printing method. A screen-printable dielectric paste was synthesized using infmicron-sized powder and a metalorganic compound, which acted as an organic vehicle and a sintering aid. The crystal structure and dielectric properties of the thin films were greatly influenced by the bottom electrodes and infstrate materials and also by firing conditions. © 1995 The Japan Society of Applied Physics.
